text: @realDonaldTrump @MikeGarcia2020 @GavinNewsom He did act. Unlike you, he takes Covid-19 seriously and doesn’t want people to not vote out of fear. Everyone had the option to mail-in or vote in person. It’s fair and secure. YIU dong like because more voters means greater loss for you. Go away.
